page.title: 10Life styles in Rogate
page.content: One of the residents of East Lodge told us of how life used to be in Rogate when she used to keep the White Horse public house. All the food was fresh as they had no refrigerators and they used candles and lamps to guide them to bed. When I go to sleep I cuddle down under the quilt and switch off the electric light just over my bed. When the lady was at school she wore a blue pinafore though she had a white one for Sunday. Me, I wear my school uniform some of the time, a green pullover over a grey skirt, but I also like to wear ordinary dresses. She used to do something called drill outside in the playground, when we do P E we can use the hall without any shoes so we have both floor and the large apparatus to explore.
